DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to determine how clozapine treatment improves neuronal measures of sensory gating in subjects with schizophrenia.
DOC.detailed_description: This study will use functional magnetic resonance imaging (fMRI) to study patients treated with risperidone, a commonly used neuroleptic that does not improves sensory gating, to those treated with clozapine to determine which brain areas are involved in clozapine's normalization of sensory gating in schizophrenia.
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of schizophrenia age 1860 yrs claustrophobia weight > 250 lbs metal in body other than dental fillings
